Screenwriter: Ben Marshall, John Higgins, Martin Herlihy
Production Co: Universal Pictures, Apatow Productions, Talent One, Mosaic
Rating: R (Sexual Material|Pervasive Language|Brief Graphic Nudity|Some Drug Material|Violence)
Synopsis: In PLEASE DON'T DESTROY: THE TREASURE OF FOGGY MOUNTAIN, John Goodman narrates the adventure of Ben, Martin, and John, three childhood friends turned deadbeat co-workers, who fend off hairless bears, desperate park rangers (Meg Stalter and X Mayo) and a hypocritical cult leader (Bowen Yang) in the hopes of finding a priceless treasure, only to discover that finding the treasure is the easiest part of their journey.
Title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
